title: Naan bread recipe
ingredients: ['80ml warm water', '1/2 teaspoon active dried yeast', '125g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 pinch bicarbonate of soda', '1 1/2 tablespoons natural yoghurt', '1 tablespoon oil', '1/2 teaspoon nigella seeds (optional)', 'butter, for brushing']
